snippet.title: Horse Life2 Wii
snippet.description:
In Horse Life 2 the player can select his horse from seven different breeds and can take care of it, train it and take part in various competitions.

The horse's behaviour is thereby depicted in a lifelike way in real-time. All competitions in the riding world such as dressage, show jumping and cross country are shown realistically. A gripping story really at-tracts the player to the screen and allows him to experience many differing tasks in a wide range of varied locations.
* Easy, fun and intuitive gameplay : Replicate true to life moves and watch your horse perform like a true champion.
* 7 breeds of horse to choose from and a huge choice of accessories for your horse and its rider.
* Care, feed and nurture your horse to competition winning health.
* A multiplayer mode on the same screen: combine your forces to overcome challenges and bonus activities

You can find the DS and Wii versions of Horselife2 on Amazon UK under the licence "Elen Whitaker"
http://www.amazon.co.uk/Ellen-Whitakers-Horse-Life-Nintendo/dp/B001F50KK4/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&s=videogames&qid=1228866008&sr=1-3

http://www.amazon.co.uk/Ellen-Whitakers-Horse-Life-Wii/dp/B001F50KKE/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&s=videogames&qid=1228866008&sr=1-5
